reviewText:
As a Darkfall player i picked the combat up fast and its really fun.

Go through the tutorial get your bindings sorted and be patient to be competitive there will be a learner curve for new players.

Props for the combat feel makes a nice change to alot of the other indie games out there where its just non existent.

Good Job

Dave Bizzle
voteText: 11 of 16 people (69%) found this review helpful 2 people found this review funny

reviewText:
Whilst the gameplay is fantastic, and the range of abilities is staggering, I'm sad to say I cant recommend this game.
It doesnt matter how good a game is if you cant play it, it is flawed. Currently this has no online community, for a game without a singleplayer mode its a real deathblow.  I hope that a community grows in the future.
Please watch my video for a more indepth review/firstlook.

https://youtu.be/uvmKw1QVDjI

reviewText: This game is a lot of fun, very non traditional combat, that requires very actively managing your various attributes.

reviewText: The game itself looks really good and seems fun. I like how you have many spells to switch between during combat (plus bow & sword). The only problem is lack of community, because the game is new. If you want to play, add me. This game won't grow if people won't give it a chance.

reviewText: Seriously fun game. Extremely nice and unique combat system (much like DF1) with a very balanced set of skills and abilities. Such a shame that it has such a minute player base as this game has a lot of potential.

reviewText: This is an amazing game if you like the old DF1 type combat... fast movement, a ton of spells and abilities, and high-skill ceiling action.\n

reviewText: Great game with excellent and deep gameplay! Only one problem, it's hard to find another player to fight against. I definantly recommend picking it up though, as it is incredibly cheap and the player base should increase once word gets around.

reviewText: Seems fun but theres literally nobody to play against :(\nReccomending it because i want people to play, and it would probably be great if it had a bigger community.

Okay, so this is my review:

PROS:
-A large amount of spells and skills
-Tons of fun with friends
-Unique combat
-Only 0,99

CONS:
-No community
-No singleplayer mode

Overall it's a fun game, and i can't wait to see how it does in the future!   8/10
Very good game, just a the population is very small. Once the population has increased then im sure people can have fun for hours upon hours with this great game.
